attributes.action: Stop all legacy prosecutions of both Veterans and Members of the Armed Forces
attributes.additional_details: There are politicians in Northern Ireland who were members of the IRA and implicated in many murders, yet we see no prosecutions of them, also many NI terrorist were let out early as part of the Good Friday agreement, are they going to be recalled to serve the rest of their sentences.
attributes.background: Give all veterans immunity of prosecution for acts related to their service to the country
